title: American Airlines and US Airways - key figures 2015
summary: The American Airlines Key in the Airways key was Number_of_aircraft_in_fleet , who made 427533.0 1 .
The most Airlines Key was Revenue_passenger_kilometers_(in_millions) , with just 55.0 1 .

In second place was Key Number_of_daily_departures with 6985.0 1 ; third place went to Key Number_of_countries_served with 55.0 1 ; fourth place went to Key Passenger_load_factor_(in_percent) with 82.0 1 and fifth place went to Key Number_of_passengers_(in_millions) , who was 197.3 1 .
gold: This statistic represents combined key figures for American Airlines and US Airways ( as of June 2015 ) . American Airlines and US Airways had passenger traffic amounting to around 351 billion revenue passenger kilometers .
